tool.name: ITSx to GFF3 Converter
tool.description: Generates a gff3 file of the ITSx extracted features LSU, ITS1, 5.8S, ITS2 and SSU
tool.help:
**Description**
Converts the output of ITSx into GFF3 file format. It parses the ITSx output, specifically features.txt and extraction.results to generate a gff3 compatible file mapping all the features to locations as well as identifiying the origin and length of original sequence.
